title: Cowboys, Indians, and Gunfighters: The Story of the Cattle Kingdom
description: An action-packed story of the days when ranchers vied with the native peoples to rule the plains of North America. Reproductions of Western art will introduce readers to Marrin's vivid re-creation of history. His accurate, carefully researched text makes it a valuable reference tool as well. Illustrated with photos, prints, and paintings.
author: Albert Marrin
